author: Staff Reporter
text:
A man riding a motorcycle was killed and the pillion rider of the vehicle sustained injuries when the vehicle rammed into a standing lorry near here on Friday.

Gopinath (37) of Edathanur village near Thandarampattu attended a wedding in Tiruvannamalai and was returning with his friend Selvam past midnight on Thursday.

Killed immediately

When their motorcycle was crossing Nallavanpalayam, Gopinath failed to notice a lorry standing in the road and rammed in it from the back. Gopinath was immediately killed.

Selvam sustained injuries and was rushed to a hospital. Thandarampattu police have registered a case.
title: Man killed in road accident
